title: Strengthening Cardano UX: Free Design Services & Audits
summary: A large amount of Cardano projects and companies lack professional branding, UI/UX, and cohesive design.This negatively impacts the user experience and limits ecosystem growth.
solution: I will provide design consultancy, branding packages, and website UI’s to enhance the visual identity and user experience of Cardano companies, boosting their professionalism and adoption.
proposer_relevant_experience:
Thyme (@design_thyme on X) from ThymeStudio will be executing the full project from inception to completion. They are the founder of Thyme Studio and have 7 years of professional experience as a designer with a degree in the field, They are well-equipped to deliver high-quality design consultancy, branding, and UI/UX services. Since 2020, they have been freelancing in the crypto/web3 space, with a specific focus on the Cardano ecosystem. This specialized experience gives them a deep understanding of the needs and challenges that Cardano projects face in terms of design and user experience.

Their portfolio can be found here www.thymestudio.co

fields.title: Campaign Category

sub_fields.title: Category Questions
sub_fields.description: Answer the following questions to determine the eligibility of your proposal.

sub_fields.title: Who you’re targeting, how you’ll reach them, and why this matters for Cardano?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
I will be targeting early stage Cardano buisnesses, small teams, and independent builders who need professional design support as they often lack the resources to access full design services.



This includes dApps preparing for launch, or consumer facing projects in need of branding or benefit from clearer optimized interfaces for stronger usability. 



I will reach these teams through active engagement on X/Twitter, Discord, Telegram, and through Catalyst channels, referrals, and community events to ensure that any project (regardless of size or funding) will have access to these services.  



This work matters for Cardano because better design directly improves the users experience, adoption, trust and retention. By strengthening the usability and visual quality of multiple projects across the ecosystem, this initiative helps teams launch polished products, reducing friction for new users, and elevating Cardano’s overall experience. This ultimately contributes to real, measurable and sustained ecosystem growth.

sub_fields.title: Provide a list of key activities of your project:
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
Key activities will be Branding Audits (8 projects), UI/UX Website or App Audits (3 projects), Branding Packages (3 project) and Website/ App design (1 project). 



This will be executed in the span of 4 months.

sub_fields.title: What are your success metrics?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer: Success will be measured by the number of supported projects (15–20) with the completion of all design deliverables. A summary and before/after comparisons of executed work will be published showing all improvements. Post-engagement surveys to all projects will showcase KPIs for signups/ CTAs, and engagement rates. After all deliverables are completed a published article summarizing common UX/branding issues encountered across Cardano will be available publicly.

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
I will provide design consultancy, branding packages, and website UI’s to enhance the visual identity and user experience of Cardano companies, boosting their professionalism and adoption.



**Thyme Studio will offer two core services:**



**Design Consultancy** for branding and websites/apps. These audits will evaluate the visual identity, user interface, and overall usability. Then a detailed list of actionable recommendations for improvement will be provided.

**Design Packages** that include branding (logo, color schemes, typography, social media assets) and website/ app UI/UX. Providing companies with polished, cohesive designs they are able to scale with.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer: By offering design consultancy and design packages it will create direct impact in the Cardano community by improving the quality of various companies. This will lead to better user experience, enhanced visibility and engagement. Companies that have strong cohesive visual identities and user-friendly interfaces attract users, and investors which directly impacts the growth and adoption of Cardano.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer: With 7 years of professional experience as a graphic designer and a degree in the field, I am well-equipped to deliver high-quality design consultancy, branding, and UI/UX services. Since 2020, I have been freelancing in the crypto/web3 space, with a specific focus on the Cardano ecosystem. This specialized experience gives me a deep understanding of the needs and challenges that Cardano projects face in terms of design and user experience.

sub_fields.title: Who is participating in the project team and what are their roles?
sub_fields.description: Who is participating in the project team and what are their roles?
sub_fields.answer:
Thyme (@design_thyme on X) from ThymeStudio will be executing the full project from inception to completion. They are the founder of Thyme Studio and have 7 years of professional experience as a designer with a degree in the field, They are well-equipped to deliver high-quality design consultancy, branding, and UI/UX services. Since 2020, they have been freelancing in the crypto/web3 space, with a specific focus on the Cardano ecosystem. This specialized experience gives them a deep understanding of the needs and challenges that Cardano projects face in terms of design and user experience.

Their portfolio can be found here www.thymestudio.co

sub_fields.title: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.description: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.answer:
Design Services: 40,000 ADA

Software and Tools: 1,000 ADA

Project Management: 5,000 ADA

Reporting and Community Engagement: 2,000 ADA

Contingency: 2,000 ADA

TOTAL 50,000 ADA



**1\. Design Services**

These funds will cover the time and expertise required for delivering the design audits and branding/UI/UX packages:

Branding Audits (8 projects @ 2,000 ADA each) 16,000 ADA

UI/UX Website or App Audits (3 projects @ 3,000 ADA each) 9,000 ADA

Branding Package (3 project @ 3,000 ADA) 9,000 ADA

Website/ App design (1 project @ 6,000 ADA) 6,000 ADA

**Total for Design Services: 40,000 ADA**

**2\. Software and Tools**

To ensure smooth workflow and high-quality outputs, Thyme Studio will utilize professional design software and tools over the 4-month period:

Adobe Creative Cloud, Figma Pro, Midjourney, and Rive. 

**Total for Software and Tools: 1,000 ADA**



**3\. Project Management**

Effective project management over the 4-month span will ensure timely and high-quality delivery with time spent on client communication, feedback cycles, project tracking, and coordination. Including but not limited to weekly check-ins with clients, scheduling, project updates, and milestone management

**Total for Project Management: 5,000 ADA**



**4\. Reporting and Community Engagement**

Engaging the Cardano community and reporting on project impact will be essential. Costs cover community updates via X, article posts, and catalyst community Forum: 1000 ADA

Public Reporting (project case studies, visual before-and-after comparisons): 1000 ADA

**Total for Reporting and Community Engagement: 2,000ADA**



**5\. Contingency**

For unexpected costs such as additional software requirements, increased client communication, or unexpected project scope etc.

**Total for Contingency: 2,000ADA**

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
**Increased Adoption:** By increasing the quality of branding and UI/UX, users will find Cardano based applications seamless to use, which will drive adoption of Cardano companies and their respective products.

**Strengthening Ecosystem Reputation:** When the majority of products and applications are easy to use and visually engaging it will help solidify Cardano’s reputation as a hub for well-executed, innovative applications. As a result Cardano companies will become more competitive in the broader blockchain landscape.

**Supporting Grassroots Growth:** This service will enable smaller, grassroots projects to have access to professional design services, helping them compete with larger players in the space. By offering consultancy and branding packages, the services supports community driven initiatives and fosters inclusivity within the ecosystem.
